name: What does "HREF" stand for?
caption: tomayko.com
description: Today it occurred to me that, after a little over ten years of basic fluency in HTML, I have absolutely no idea why the `href` attribute is named "href". Why not "url", "link", or even just "ref"?

data.message: If HTML is abbreviation for Hyper Text Markup Language then HREF is for Hyper text REFerence  :)
